DOC.detailed_description: Treatment include 6 course chemoimmunotherapy , first three course high dose methotrexate-based combination ( MATRIX ) follow three course R-ICE combination finally BCNU-thiotepa- contain condition subsequent autologous stem cell transplantation . MATRIX ( course 1 , 2 , 3 ) : Rituximab 375 mg/m2 , Methotrexate 3.5 g/m2 , Cytarabine 2 g/m2 , Folinic rescue 15 mg/m2 , Thiotepa 30 mg/m2 , Intrathecal liposomial cytarabine 50 mg , rHuG-CSF 2,5 g/kg s.c. R-ICE ( course 4 , 5 , 6 ) : Rituximab 375 mg/m2 , Etoposide 100 mg/m2/d , Ifosfamide 5 g/m2 , Intrathecal liposomial cytarabine 50 mg
